body:
## What happens next ##

If you provided an email address, we have also sent you an email with a copy of this completed form and details of how to contact us.

We will contact you if we need more details to be able to answer your request.

When we have all of the information we need, you should receive a response within 30 days.

components.html: Asking for updates during this 30 day time period may mean it takes longer to get the information you want.

heading: Request sent
lede: We will let you know if we have enough information to start processing your request and, if we do, send you a reference number by post or email.
